nodes.bodyText: Binary data is now Base64 encoded apparently. I'll add a mention in the changelog. Normally it would be considered a breaking change as you removed the @Beta label on the asJson() method, but since it is also mentioned that the method is only for debugging it is probably acceptable? WDYT?

nodes.bodyText: It is an optional setting set through Realm.init(context, userAgent)
is this exposed for test? who needed this override?

It was added in this PR: #6270
It looks like we don't have automatic tests for it, but only verified the behavior manually.
